full_summary:
----------

### Government Tender Announcement: E6MON-23PQBO

#### Solicitation Information

| **Title (English)** | **Title (French)** | **Reference Number** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| E6MON-23PQBO - RMSO Bakery products - Period 02 | E6MON-23PQBO - OCPR Produits de boulangerie - Période 02 | WS3887518377-Doc4051505135 |

#### Tender Details

*   **Publication Date**: June 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 6, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Solicitation Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

*   The tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements mentioned below.
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Supply and Delivery

*   **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   **End-User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Ly, Selina (SPAC/PSPC) - elle-la / she-her
*   **Contact Email**: <selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16557263?extsite=MTY1NTcyNjNfQU4wMT
